p: Tocilizumab is a monoclonal antibody (mAb) that inhibits the IL-6 Receptor. As mentioned earlier, IL-6 plays a key role in respiratory viral infections and in CRS which is linked to poorer prognosis and higher mortality rate in COVID-19 patients. Tocilizumab is approved for the treatment of rheumatoid arthritis and its safety and efficacy profile has previously been well studied [ 7, 74].
